Used in the same way as a pickaxe, however it mines blocks in a 3x3 grid. The 3x3 mining is disabled while the player is crouched.
If the difference in hardness levels between the block mined and those in a 3x3 grid around it are too great, those blocks won't be mined (e.g. When mining stone, surrounding obsidian won't be mined).
This is just one example of a recipe, mining hammers can be crafted using most GregTech materials.
